page.title: 04TRANSPORT,Yeoford Station.
page.content: {Yeoford Station}has one used platform and two other unused platforms. It has two tracks but it used to be much more than that. Now it only has one waiting room but it used to have a buffet, a ticket office and lots more. One of the tracks is used for passenger services and the other track is used for transporting. For the passenger service the train is a diesel multiple unit. From{Barnstaple}to{Exeter (Monday to Friday) seven trains stop at{Yeoford,}six of them are request stops. From{Barnstaple to Exeter (Saturdays) the train stops seven times in{Yeoford,}four of them are request stops. From{Barnstaple to {Exeter}(Sundays) three trains stop in {Yeoford,}they are all request stops. To request a train to stop you have to stick your hand out. If you are on the train you ask the guard to stop.
